name: Sonic Freedom Forces
description:
This is a demo that will have 5 zones in the finished product, it is 2D focused, and is made in Game Maker Studio. Game is heavy WIP. This is just a test file for new players to try. 

Current Features: 

- 1 playable character - Sonic The Hedgehog

- 1 act, Tropical Track

- (NOT FINISHED) Homing Attack

- Ability to use Spindash

- Power-ups

- (NOT FINISHED) Grinding

- Slope physics

- Ranking System

Controls:

- Arrow Keys to move

- X to jump

- Z is action button

             -  Press Z while in air to Homing Attack

             - Hold Z while pressing down to charge a Spindash

- Press enter to pause the game
